name: HigherME
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hire me
des: HigherME (a play on words of "hire me") is a pet project I started after recently embarking on a job hunt. I wanted to create something that would help me verbalise my outlines so that I could be more practised, prepared, and precise for my interviews. This skill asks you several standard interview questions, then it transcribes your answers and gives you suggestions on how to strengthen your responses.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
